    • Method Detail

      • getMyRequests

        java.lang.Iterable<Status> getMyRequests()
        Retrieves the statuses of all permission requests for the current account.

        The API will stream a potentially very large set of results back to the client

        Returns:
        Permission requests in the state RequestStatus.SUBMITTED across all objects.

      • getMyRequests

        java.lang.Iterable<Status> getMyRequests(RequestStatus requestStatus)
        Retrieves the statuses of all outstanding permission requests.
        Returns:
        All permission requests in the state RequestStatus.SUBMITTED

      • submit

        java.lang.Void submit(java.util.Set<Request> requests)
        Submits a set of permission requests.
        Parameters:
        requests - Requests to submit
        Returns:

      • getStatuses

        java.lang.Iterable<Status> getStatuses(java.util.Set<java.util.List<java.util.UUID>> aclKeys)
        Retrieves all status information for a set of AclKeys.
        Parameters:
        aclKeys - A set of aclKeys for which to retrieve status information.
        Returns:
        For each aclKey ( List<UUID> ) this will return all statuses in any state across all users for callers who are owners and the caller's statuses in any state for callers who are not owners.

      • getStatuses

        java.lang.Iterable<Status> getStatuses(RequestStatus requestStatus,
                                       java.util.Set<java.util.List<java.util.UUID>> requests)
        Retrieves the status for all objects in the state specified by requestStatus
        Parameters:
        requestStatus - The RequestStatus to match against.
        requests - A list of acl keys whose status will be checked against
        Returns:
        For each aclKey ( List<UUID> ) this will return all statuses in the state specified by requestStatus across all users for callers who are owners and the caller's statuses in the state specified by requestStatus for callers who are not owners

      • updateStatuses

        java.lang.Void updateStatuses(java.util.Set<Status> statuses)
        Updates a set of permission requests.
        Parameters:
        statuses - The status updates to attempt to apply.
        Returns:
        200 OK if request succeeds or 403 if the user doesn't have ownership over all objects he is attempting to udpate.s
